channel.title: Bowser's puny attempt at a sketchbook
channel.description:
As I got my Bamboo tablet, I will post my drawings and hopefully improve.
First out Putin (Who doesn't look like Putin) [img width=600]http://i.imgur.com/g3BRM.png[/img]
A dog (Hopefully) WIP First version[s]http://i.imgur.com/PluR2.png[/s] Second version: [IMG width=600]http://i.imgur.com/T9HYI.jpg[/img]
The pokemon Aron: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kbU7qyx.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o71zDfS.png[/img]
Cybermen. I'm aware of the terrible earpiece, headpiece, but I don't get it as I want. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fpsnSeS.png[/img]

item.title: Bowser's puny attempt at a sketchbook
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:25, topic:477809”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=596005.msg4306440#msg4306440 date=1369910400]

the aron pokemon looks p nice

im surprised theres no downfall of america or something yet

I would like to draw a picture of America in a nuclear winter, but there is too many details.
[/quote]
When confronted you say you don’t hate Americans you just hate the government

lol ok bowser we kno ur anti[/quote]
I will not take this any further than this, but I just want to clarify. I don’t literary that United States’ downfall should be a nuclear attack against the country, but I do think they should lose their cultural and military dominance. I’m not advocating for murdering Americans.

Read full topic

item.title: Bowser's puny attempt at a sketchbook
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:9, topic:477809”][quote author=RS PS link=topic=596005.msg4197201#msg4197201 date=1357680574]
Lol… Why does everyone love drawing Frell?

Anyways the drawings are nice.
[/quote]
KroniKz requested it.

nickog15:
It is pink. May you suggest a better colour I could use?
I do not try to draw real people, I just try to find a drawing method that works for me.[/quote]
For lips, you take the skin color and add white/pinkish shades. At least, that’s what I would do.

Read full topic

Anyways the drawings are nice.[/quote]

nickog15:
It is pink. May you suggest a better colour I could use?
I do not try to draw real people, I just try to find a drawing method that works for me.

item.source: Bowser's puny attempt at a sketchbook

item.title: Bowser's puny attempt at a sketchbook
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:6, topic:477809”][quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=596005.msg4196652#msg4196652 date=1357593045]
I love the second one

draw frell?
[/quote]
[s]Maybe, but I’m must first find out how I can draw his hair.


The start of my attempt to draw his body. I can worry about his head later.[/s]

This was made heavily with help on a reference picture, so this is only practice to get some stuff right.

ftlws9.png1080×1599

I really need to learn to draw heads/faces. It is supposed to be Frell.[/quote]

Well if you want to draw real people… NEWS FLASH… Nipples are not purple, nor are lips. (:

Read full topic
